name: Johnny the coward
description:
Short game made for Game Jam - Bored Pixels Jam 8.

THEME: You Are Not The Hero

Controls:

  • Move with [Arrow keys] or [A / D]
  • Sprint with [Shift] or [X]
  • Jump with [Arrow Up] or [W] or [Spacebar] or [Z]

Made using:

  • Godot mono 3.2.2 - game editor
  • JetBrains Rider - IDE
  • Aseprite - artwork
